[[inst_hl_ldi_po]]
==== HL.LDI.PO

*Syntax:* hl.ldi.po [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldi_po.svg[HL.LDI.PO encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA/POST_INDEX

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "POST_INDEX", "agu_kind": "LDA", "note": "User confirmed all loads are AGU/LDA", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
